author: AETerry
title: Charlie Crow Review
review:
Most of the Fabuland sets I have and recall having, have all been those small sets that feature just an Animal Minifigure and some accessories.

 

Charlie Crow's Carry-All offers a little bit more a complex design for a child who's beginning to explore LEGO and moving away from playing with Duplo.

 

There's hours of play a child can have loading up the back of the truck with the garbage can accessory and piling the shovel and broom up behind as the minifigure drives about looking for something else to collect or clean up.
